title: Plantation Youth Conference
decision_details: - The Ministry of Water Supply and Estate Infrastructure Development has planned to hold a Youth Conference as a part of the National Programme to mark 200 years for the Sri Lankan Plantation Community(NAAM 200). The said Conference titled "Future Fusion" is scheduled to be held on 2024‑06‑22 at the Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology, Kandy with the participation of youth. The Conference is organized by the Ministry of Water Supply and Estate Infrastructure Development in collaboration with AIESEC a voluntary organization comprising stakeholders including the University of Peradeniya, Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology and university students and youths. Simultaneously, the Ceylon Chamber of Commerce has agreed to hold a career fare. Cabinet noted the information submitted by the Minister of Water Supply and Estate Infrastructure Development in this regard.
